last_episode_to_air.name: Reunion (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: Kail shares a devastating secret while Briana defends her choices. Kail’s ex, Chris, shares his side of the story and a surprise guest shocks everyone.

name: Teen Mom 2
overview: Jenelle, Chelsea, Kailyn, and Leah are four young women navigating complicated lives. It's not always easy being a young mom.

episodes.name: Nothing Stays the Same
episodes.overview: Teen mom Jenelle is going out all hours of the night, causing her mom to serve her papers to take away custody of baby Jace, while Leah attempts to win back Corey, the father of her twins. Chelsea moves out of her dad's house with baby Aubree and tries to get back on track to graduate from high school, and Kailyn is heartbroken when Jo breaks up with her, and tries to get over it by flirting with a guy at work.

episodes.name: So Much to Lose
episodes.overview: Leah breaks down when a doctor's visit reveals that there's something wrong with one of the twins and she turns to Corey for comfort, while Chelsea starts hanging out with her ex-boyfriend Adam again, much to her friends' dismay. Kailyn starts dating a new guy but things go haywire when Jo and his family find out about it, and Jenelle convinces her mom to let her come home when she realizes how much she misses Jace.

episodes.name: Change of Heart
episodes.overview: Over the fourth of July, Jo's parents give Kailyn an ultimatum; lose the new guy and focus on school or find a new place to live, while Jenelle has a change of heart and agrees to sign custody of Jace over to her mom. Leah and Corey give it another shot and get back together and Chelsea tells Megan she's giving Adam another chance.

episodes.name: Moving In, Moving On
episodes.overview: Teenage mom Kailyn is forced to borrow money from Jo to make her school payments, and Chelsea breaks the news to Megan that she's going to let Adam move in with them so Aubree can have a normal family. Jenelle meets a new guy and stays out all night with him, and Leah and Corey decide to move in together and find their own place.

episodes.name: Too Much Too Fast
episodes.overview: While Jenelle is trying to figure out how to pay for school, she breaks Barbara's rules again, and things get tough for Corey and Leah once she's stuck at home watching the girls full time. Adam moves in and Chelsea tries to keep it from her dad, and Kailyn starts school but has to figure out where she and Isaac should live when Jo's parents kick them out.

episodes.name: Taking Sides
episodes.overview: Things between Adam and Megan reach a boiling point and he forces her to move out, while Barbara helps Jenelle get her financial aid and invites her to attend Jace's first birthday. Things improve between Leah and Corey and their romance heats up, and Kailyn moves back in with Jo's parents and tells everyone that she doesn't want to be with Jo.

episodes.name: Switching Gears
episodes.overview: Corey surprises Leah with a marriage proposal, but things get hard when an eye doctor tells her Ali's development problems may originate in the brain. Chelsea tries to shift her focus back to school, while Kailyn gets a second job so she can move out on her own. Jenelle and her boyfriend Kieffer wear out their welcome at a friend's house and have to find a place to live while Jenelle begins college.

episodes.name: Pushing the Limit
episodes.overview: Jenelle and Kieffer are forced to ask Barbara if they can move in with her, while Chelsea's dad continues to put pressure on Adam to find a job. Kailyn starts dating her ex without telling Jo, and Leah and Corey put wedding planning on hold as the try to get some answers by bringing Ali in for an MRI.

episodes.name: Slippery Slope
episodes.overview: Jo confronts Kailyn about dating Jordan behind his back and she moves in with her mom, while Leah and Corey continue planning for their wedding and get some good news regarding Ali's health. Jenelle and Kieffer hatch a plan to run off to New Jersey, and things between Chelsea and Adam continue to go downhill.

episodes.name: Two Steps Forward
episodes.overview: Things between Leah and Corey turn ugly when she starts having second thoughts about the wedding, while Chelsea and her girlfriends decide to celebrate her breakup with Adam by taking a road trip to a Lady Gaga show. Jenelle and Kieffer enjoy themselves in New Jersey until Barbara discovers her credit cards are missing, and Kailyn settles into life at her mom's house but can't get her belongings back from Jo.

episodes.name: One Step Back
episodes.overview: Chelsea is busy studying for her GED, but gets distracted when she meets a new guy, while Jenelle has to face the music about stealing her mom's credit cards. Kailyn tries to focus on college and files for an official custody agreement with Jo, and Leah and Corey get closer when told they have to take Ali to another doctor days before their wedding

episodes.name: Judgement Day
episodes.overview: As Chelsea prepares for Aubree's first birthday party, her dad does what he can to keep Adam permanently out of the picture, while Jenelle is arrested for breaking and entering and realizes Kieffer is a bad influence. Kailyn goes to court to sign a joint custody agreement, and Leah and Corey tie the knot.

episodes.name: Best Laid Plans
episodes.overview: Jenelle is back with Kieffer after bailing him out of jail; Chelsea debates giving Adam another chance; Leah looks for a job; and Kailyn takes Isaac trick-or-treating.

episodes.name: Curveball
episodes.overview: Jenelle is living in her car with Kieffer; Leah is devastated to learn Ali will have to be sedated for an MRI; Chelsea re-tears her ACL; and Kailyn can't afford to live on her own.

episodes.name: Intensive Care
episodes.overview: Kailyn moves out without telling her mom. Jenelle files charges against Kieffer. Chelsea relies on Adam to take care of Aubree while she recovers from surgery. Corey and Leah get emotional during Ali's MRI.

episodes.name: No Looking Back
episodes.overview: Ali's MRI comes back negative to the relief of Leah. Jenelle juggles finding peace with her mom and dealing with Kieffer's domestic charges. Kailyn tries a new form of birth control. Chelsea fends for herself after surgery.

episodes.name: Home for Christmas
episodes.overview: Kailyn adjusts to being alone for the holidays, while Chelsea and Adam reconcile. Leah works to make a memorable Christmas for the twins and Jenelle regrets filing charges against Kieffer.

episodes.name: Lean on Me
episodes.overview: Chelsea learns a friend of hers is pregnant, while Leah is horrified to learn that Aliannah may have a genetic disorder. Kieffer and Jenelle have a court date set for them and Kailyn becomes annoyed with the men in her life.

episodes.name: Breaking Point
episodes.overview: Kieffer is upset that Jenelle hung out with an old boyfriend. Leah is relieved that Ali has no major genetic disorder. Adam slips back into his old ways, much to the dismay of Chelsea. Kailyn considers filing for child support.

episodes.name: Making Moves
episodes.overview: Jenelle moves in with her best friend Tori after fighting with Barbara, and Kieffer reenters the picture. Chelsea's relationship with Adam is going downhill fast. Ali may still have a genetic problem. Jo confronts Kailyn about filing for child support and they get into a big argument about who is the more responsible parent.

episodes.name: The Beginning of the End
episodes.overview: Jenelle fights with both Kieffer and Tori. Chelsea struggles to deal with Adam breaking up with her. Leah is livid when Corey wants to buy a truck instead of moving. Jo appeals Kailyn's child support request.

episodes.name: Love Comes and Goes
episodes.overview: Kailyn's child support hearing is postponed and Jo meets Jordan for the first time. Jenelle has her day in court for the breaking and entering and possession of marijuana charges. Chelsea struggles to get over Adam. Corey finds out that Leah cheated on him two weeks before their wedding.

episodes.name: Falling
episodes.overview: Jenelle decides to go to rehab. Chelsea finds a GED class at a local college, goes in for a consultation, and takes her first practice test. Leah files for divorce in order to protect her custody rights. Jo visits Issac during the week and Kailyn hooks up with Jo, even though she's still with Jordan.

episodes.name: Love Will Tear Us Apart
episodes.overview: Corey arranges visitation with the girls while Leah moves her stuff out of Corey's house. Jenelle finds out she might be bipolar while in rehab. Chelsea decides to take the GED test. Kailyn confesses her hook up with Jo.

episodes.name: Walk the Line
episodes.overview: In the Season 3 premiere, Leah prepares for her divorce; Jenelle tries to stay clean while on probation; and Kailyn wants to get back together with Jo.

episodes.name: Keeping Hope Alive
episodes.overview: Leah and Corey go to mediation over custody of the girls, while Chelsea and Adam take a big step forward. Jenelle fails a drug test, and Kailyn tries to connect with her estranged mother.

episodes.name: Things Come to an End
episodes.overview: Leah and Corey finalize their divorce; Chelsea's father learns that she is living with Adam; Jenelle goes against her lawyer's advice; Kailyn sees a picture of Jo and his girlfriend.

episodes.name: Life Goes On
episodes.overview: Leah looks into a nursing program; Chelsea is invited to a concert; Jenelle pays the price for her probation; Kailyn wants to change the custody agreement.

episodes.name: Second Chances
episodes.overview: Leah starts college and goes on a date, Chelsea and Adam officially call it quits, Jenelle writes a letter to her probation officer, and Kailyn starts feeling smothered by Jordan.

episodes.name: A Leap of Faith
episodes.overview: Jenelle gets set up with a boy, Leah and Jeremy become a couple, Chelsea sees a therapist, and Kailyn officially ends things with Jordan.

episodes.name: Building Blocks
episodes.overview: While Chelsea gets her life on track, Jenelle decides to move in with Josh, Kailyn plans to visit family in Texas, and Corey gives Leah mixed feelings by second guessing their divorce.

episodes.name: Caught in the Middle
episodes.overview: Leah tells Jeremy about her confusion regarding Corey, and Chelsea tries to get back on track with school. Things fall apart with Jenelle because she moved in too quickly with Josh and Kailyn goes to Texas and reconnects with her cousin and half sister.

episodes.name: A New Direction
episodes.overview: Leah finds a bigger house to move into with Jeremy and Chelsea's dog goes missing. Jenelle breaks up with Josh, and Kailyn learns her mother Suzi visited Isaac behind her back.

episodes.name: Half Empty Half Full
episodes.overview: Leah plans a birthday party for the girls; Chelsea convinces her father to help her move; Kieffer re-enters Jenelle's life; Kailyn meets a new boy.

episodes.name: Breakdown
episodes.overview: Leah and Jeremy get serious; Chelsea breaks down on Adam's birthday; Jenelle questions Andrew's paternity; Kailyn is asked on a date.

episodes.name: A Means to an End
episodes.overview: Leah has news for Corey; Chelsea prepares for beauty school; Jenelle goes through with the paternity test; Kailyn and Jo fight about his new girlfriend.

episodes.name: Under Pressure
episodes.overview: Leah deals with reemerging feelings for Corey; Jenelle and Gary spend time with Jace; Kailyn and Jo fight; Chelsea fears another pregnancy.

episodes.name: Love Hurts
episodes.overview: Kailyn and Jo go to court; Chelsea has her first day at beauty school; Leah expresses feelings for Corey; Jenelle learns that Gary has slept with her best friend.

episodes.name: The Future Is Now
episodes.overview: Leah is torn between Corey and Jeremy; Adam wants to see Aubree; Jenelle finishes probation; Kailyn takes Isaac to Jo's place.

episodes.name: Faded Love
episodes.overview: Jenelle ends up getting back together with Kieffer. Chelsea reveals her pregnancy scare to her mom. Kailyn attempts to revisie her custody agreement for the second time. Jeremy and Corey have a talk about Jeremy's intentions with Leah.

episodes.name: So Hard to Say Goodbye
episodes.overview: Leah chooses who she truly wants to be with. Kailyn and Javi's relationship gets stronger when the two take a big step. Jenelle and Kieffer go back to their old ways.

episodes.name: Fall to Pieces
episodes.overview: As Kieffer ends up becoming the same bad influence, Jenelle tries to stay responsible. Leah starts to prepare for her upcoming wedding. Chelsea receives the news about Adam's new girlfriend. Kailyn is left rethinking her actions after she has a violent outburst toward Javi.

episodes.name: For Better or for Worse
episodes.overview: The day has come for Leah and Jeremy to get married. Meanwhile, Kailyn and Javi start to discuss their future and possible marriage. Adam attempts to make Chelsea jealous. Gary has a surprise in store for Jenelle.

episodes.name: Don't Be Cruel
episodes.overview: A domestic violence incident between Gary and Jenelle sends them both to jail. Kailyn and Javi contemplate getting married in Las Vegas. Leah and Jeremy start their married life together by purchasing a new home.

episodes.name: Sweet Dreams
episodes.overview: Chelsea chooses to take a break from school. Leah tries to contact her biological father. After her fight with Gary, Jenelle goes to court.

episodes.name: For Love and Money
episodes.overview: Jenelle, Barb and Kieffer come together to celebrate Jace's third birthday. Wedding bells are ringing after Leah and Jeremy get married. Chelsea goes out for a night on the town to celebrate her 21st birthday.

episodes.name: Hard Knocks
episodes.overview: Chelsea celebrates Aubree's third birthday. Jenelle's small chances of gaining custody of Jace are shown. Leah takes Ali to a doctors appointment. Kailyn has to inform Jo about her future with Javi.

episodes.name: The End of the Road
episodes.overview: Discovering that Jenelle is using drugs, Barbara tries to have her committed. Chelsea returns to beauty school. Kail and Javi get married before Javi is shipped off to Boot Camp. Leah’s daughter goes through medical testings.

episodes.name: Revelations
episodes.overview: Jenelle decides to terminate a pregnancy; Kailyn has a baby shower; Leah struggles with Ali's diagnosis; Chelsea contends with Adam having another baby.

episodes.name: Love Will Never Do Without You
episodes.overview: Jenelle meets a new guy; Chelsea has her first day of school; Kailyn and Jo fight about her move to Delaware; Leah goes on vacation.

episodes.name: Keep Your Head Up
episodes.overview: Ali will need to use a wheelchair; Jo and Kailyn fight about Isaac's drop-off; Jenelle and Nathan decide to cohabit.

episodes.name: Working Overtime
episodes.overview: Jenelle moves in with Nathan; Chelsea invites Adam to pick up Aubree from pre-school; Kailyn and Javi put in an offer on a house.

episodes.name: You Got Me
episodes.overview: Jenelle and Nathan discuss having a child together. Corey has a difficult time with the news that Ali needs a wheelchair. Kailyn starts planning for her wedding.

episodes.name: False Positives
episodes.overview: Chelsea throws Aubree's birthday party; Kailyn and Jo got to court; Jenelle and Nathan believe they are pregnant; Jeremy returns home after passing out at work.

episodes.name: These Are the Days
episodes.overview: Kailyn has a meltdown; Leah and Jeremy meet with Corey to discuss Ali starting school; Aubree meets Adam's baby; Jenelle learns a plea bargain may be possible.

episodes.name: Breakdown
episodes.overview: Adam sends Chelsea a visitation request; Jenelle undergoes surgery; Kailyn goes for a fitting for her wedding dress; Leah and Corey support Ali on her first day of school.

episodes.name: Miss You Much
episodes.overview: Aubree attends her first dance class; Jeremy and Leah disagree; Jenelle and Barbara argue about Barb's fight with Nathan; Kailyn realizes her mother will not attend her wedding.

episodes.name: We Belong Together
episodes.overview: Kailyn and Javi celebrate their wedding; Chelsea graduates from esthetician school; Jenelle accepts a plea; Jeremy turns down a local job.

episodes.name: Out of the Blue
episodes.overview: Javi takes Isaac to Jo's; Adam responds to Chelsea's objection; Ali tests her wheelchair; Leah struggles with Jeremy's absence; Jenelle and Nathan get exciting news.

episodes.name: What You See Is Not What You Get
episodes.overview: Kailyn's baby is born; Chelsea struggles with the visitation agreement; Leah and Jeremy focus on their relationship; Jenelle is pregnant.

episodes.name: That's the Way Love Goes
episodes.overview: Javi returns to work, leaving Kailyn with the children; Jo finds a new apartment; things get worse between Nathan and Jenelle; Chelsea receives news about Adam; Leah learns the cause of Ali's illness.

episodes.name: Keep It Together
episodes.overview: Jenelle learns the gender of her baby; Ali becomes aware of her condition; Kailyn strives to raise two children and maintain her marriage; Chelsea receives unexpected news.

episodes.name: When Everything Seems Wrong
episodes.overview: Jenelle and Nathan prepare for his approaching jail time; Chelsea moves into her new house; Kailyn invites Jo and Vee to Isaac's birthday party; Leah struggles after receiving bad news.

episodes.name: Overload
episodes.overview: Leah begins taking anxiety medicine; Kailyn and Javi visit Joe and Vee's apartment; Nathan gets ready for jail; Jenelle worries about being alone; Chelsea meets with a lawyer.

episodes.name: Harder Than It Looks
episodes.overview: Jenelle struggles to take care of Jace while Nathan is away; Leah and Jeremy disagree over finances; Chelsea looks into Adam's legal charges; Kailyn celebrates her birthday.

episodes.name: I'll Be Missing You
episodes.overview: Leah and Jeremy visit Ali's specialist; Jenelle and Nathan reunite upon his release from jail; Chelsea learns about Adam's court appearance; Javi departs on a trip for work; Kailyn feels lonely.

episodes.name: Family Matters
episodes.overview: Jo and Vee visit Kailyn, whose estranged mother has shown up; Chelsea gets word about her esthetician license; Corey's father helps Leah with Ali's wheelchair; Jenelle starts the divorce process.

episodes.name: Bad Behavior
episodes.overview: Chelsea must deal with the consequences when Adam is arrested again; Leah tries to manage jealousy between the twins; Nathan and Barbara clash; Kailyn tries to explain Javi's absence to Isaac.

episodes.name: Cabin Fever
episodes.overview: Jenelle and Barbara clash over Jace's behavioral difficulties; Kailyn tries to get the children ready for Javi's return; Leah takes Corey to court; Chelsea learns of Adam's new girlfriend.

episodes.name: Summer Daze, Summertime Sadness
episodes.overview: Kailyn and Jo disagree about Isaac's visitation schedule; Chelsea meets Adam's new girlfriend; arguments erupt at Jenelle's baby shower.

episodes.name: Co-Parenthood
episodes.overview: Jenelle gives birth to a second son; Leah learns that Corey wants full custody of the girls; Isaac leaves for summer visitation with Jo; Chelsea is shocked when Adam's ex returns.

episodes.name: Wish You Were Here
episodes.overview: Leah and Corey face each other in court; Kailyn and Javi adjust to their new life; Chelsea deals with another of Adam's arrests; Jenelle tries to build a family for Jace and Kaiser.

episodes.name: All Grown Up
episodes.overview: Jenelle approaches Barbara about gaining custody; Kailyn reunites with Isaac; Chelsea tries to move on romantically.

episodes.name: Keep It Moving
episodes.overview: Javi blows up over something he finds on Kailyn’s phone. Chelsea is shocked when Adam requests 50/ 50 custody of Aubree. With her marriage to Jeremy on the rocks, Leah has to face Corey in court for custody of their daughters.

episodes.name: Shakedown
episodes.overview: Leah must take a court-ordered drug test; Chelsea and Adam's exes join forces.

episodes.name: No Apologies
episodes.overview: Chelsea and Adam lawyer up for their custody battle. Jenelle and Nathan’s explosive arguing threatens her chance of gaining custody of Jace. Corey presses for more time with the girls, while Leah and Jeremy’s marriage crumbles.

episodes.name: Not Good Enough
episodes.overview: Leah and Corey's relationship takes a turn for the worst; Barbara and Jace visit Jenelle; Kailyn and Javi discuss the future of their marriage.

episodes.name: Can't Trust Them
episodes.overview: Jenelle files for full custody of Jace; and squares off with Barb. In other events, Kailyn and Javi's marital problems follow her to L.A. ; and Chelsea and Taylor's custody hearings with Adam intensify

episodes.name: Walk Out
episodes.overview: Chelsea learns information about Taylor that could impact her court case with Adam; Jeremy threatens Leah with divorce; and Nathan's behavior causes Jenelle to rethink their engagement.

episodes.name: Wanna Love You
episodes.overview: Nathan is arrested after a physical altercation with Jenelle; Leah reaches her breaking point after receiving divorce papers; Chelsea and Adam face each other in court; Kailyn takes a vacation for her birthday.

episodes.name: What Makes You Happy
episodes.overview: Jenelle pleads with Nathan to stay together; Kailyn fears that Jo's move is too close for comfort; and Leah, who's overwhelmed by a looming divorce and custody threats, makes a big decision.

episodes.name: Run Away
episodes.overview: Leah must return from therapy; Jenelle and Nathan struggle to co-parent; Kailyn and Javi adjust to Jo and Vee living close.

episodes.name: Except a Miracle
episodes.overview: Kailyn is torn between Javi and Jo; Leah finalizes her divorce and prepares to return to therapy; and Jenelle and Barbara meet in court to discuss custody of Jace.

episodes.name: Sorry Not Sorry
episodes.overview: Jenelle may face felony charges after a fight with Nathan and his new girlfriend; Chelsea notices Adam's actions are impacting Aubree; Kailyn is beside herself when Jo goes missing; and Leah ends her marriage.

episodes.name: Face Off
episodes.overview: Jo lashes out at Kailyn when she threatens legal action against him. Leah returns from treatment, but things with Corey hit their boiling point. After being bailed out of jail, Jenelle must face her fate with Nathan.

episodes.name: Here We Go Again
episodes.overview: Nathan threatens Jenelle with felony charges.  Leah gets sad news about Ali while waiting to hear if she loses custody of the twins.  Kailyn tries to rebuild her relationship with Jo but hurts things with Javi.

episodes.name: In the Dark
episodes.overview: When Nathan takes Kaiser on an unexpected trip, Jenelle tries to charge him with kidnapping.  Leah anxiously awaits word from the court but Corey receives the verdict of their custody case.

episodes.name: Breaking Apart
episodes.overview: Leah receives the verdict of her custody case. A huge fight destroys Kailyn and Jo’s renewed friendship. Jenelle introduces her new boyfriend to Barb. Chelsea is outraged by something Adam posts online.

episodes.name: Iced Out
episodes.overview: Kailyn and Javi get some bad news about his job.  Leah blames Corey for confusing the twins with their new custody arrangement.  Barbara is concerned about Jenelle's new boyfriend.  Chelsea and Cole take a major step together.

episodes.name: No Access
episodes.overview: Cole has a big surprise for Chelsea.  Kailyn reveals a huge secret that's been weighing on her and Javi.  Jenelle is forced to face her assault charges against Nathan's girlfriend.

episodes.name: Hindsight
episodes.overview: Leah considers reuniting with Jeremy; Isaac struggles with Javi's impending deployment; Jenelle's birthday trip to New York is ruined by Nathan; Chelsea and Cole celebrate their engagement; and Aubree has sad news about Adam.

episodes.name: Man of the House
episodes.overview: Javi says a tearful goodbye to his family before deployment.  Jenelle meets with Nathan, fueling David's jealousy.  Corey and Leah face-off at Ali's doctors appointment.  Chelsea and Cole debate changing Aubree's last name.

episodes.name: Didn't Mean It
episodes.overview: Leah and Cory battle in court for custody of the twins.  Jenelle agrees to let Nathan see Kaiser and David volunteers to be their contact person.  Kailyn struggles to help Isaac while he misses Javi.

episodes.name: While You Were Out
episodes.overview: Barbara and David face off over Jenelle, leading to a 911 call. Aubree gets a new accessory. Kailyn and Javi struggle with his deployment. Leah gets troubling news about custody.

episodes.name: Choose Your Battles
episodes.overview: Kailyn works on her relationship with Vee; Cole takes Aubree to a father-daughter dance; Jenelle seeks help in New York for mysterious medical ailments; and Leah and Corey's co-parenting is shattered by a disturbing video.

episodes.name: Turn the Page
episodes.overview: Jenelle's medical woes lead to a disastrous fight with Barbara.  Leah and Miranda make amends.  Aubree drops a big question on Adam.  Kailyn rebuilds her relationship with Jo but distances herself from Javi.

episodes.name: Gone Fishing
episodes.overview: An emotional meltdown over Barb ruins Jenelle’s fun day with her sons. Kailyn and Javi’s marriage is dangerously close to divorce. Chelsea celebrates milestones with Aubree.

episodes.name: Breaking the Wall
episodes.overview: Jenelle faces Nathan and his girlfriend in court for her assault trial. Aubree goes dress shopping for Chelsea and Cole's wedding, while Adam airs some frustrations. Jeremy has to leave town, much to Addie and Leah’s dismay.

episodes.name: Deja Vu
episodes.overview: Leah struggles with Addie missing her father. Chelsea meets with Adam's ex.  Jenelle and Nathan face off in court over custody of Kaiser.  Kailyn starts summer school with some extra help from Jo.
Nessa sits down with the Moms and look back at some of the never before seen footage from the past season.

episodes.name: Homecoming
episodes.overview: Javi returns home from deployment with mixed reactions.  After a flood devastates West Virginia, Jeremy and Leah have trouble communicating.  Chelsea hopes her doctors visit goes well so she can finally make the baby announcement.

episodes.name: Privacy Please
episodes.overview: Jenelle and David keep some big news under wraps. Kailyn and Javi adjust to their new relationship. Jeremy isn't happy about Leah's vacation plans. Chelsea finds out Adam is behind on child support.

episodes.name: Heartache
episodes.overview: Javi and Kailyn get into a huge fight after he shows up unannounced. Jenelle tries to keep her pregnancy a secret from Barbara. Chelsea and Cole question postponing their wedding.

episodes.name: Last to Know
episodes.overview: Jenelle reveals her pregnancy to Barbara and Jace. Aubree starts first grade. Jo co-parents Isaac with both Kailyn and Javi. Leah and her daughters take a girls trip to California.

episodes.name: Fake Out
episodes.overview: Leah receives some surprise news from Ali's doctor about Aleeah.  Jenelle thinks Nathan is trying to win her back and David isn't having it.  Kailyn and Isaac start school but the added pressure causes strife between Jo and Vee.

episodes.name: I Don't Wanna Talk About It
episodes.overview: Jenelle prepares for her upcoming court date after getting some surprising news about Nathan. Chelsea celebrates Aubree's seventh birthday. Jeremy returns home from South Dakota. Kailyn and Javi's future is up in the air.

episodes.name: Low Blows
episodes.overview: Divorce mediation leads to arguments outside the courthouse for Kailyn and Javi; Chelsea officially reveals her baby's gender and Leah finds out that Jeremy is engaged.

episodes.name: Ready or Not
episodes.overview: Jenelle reaches her boiling point with Barbara.  Chelsea and Cole add a temporary member to their family.  Kailyn and Javi face off.  Leah is forced to make a tough decision about beauty school.

episodes.name: Cherries and Flowers
episodes.overview: Chelsea and Cole tie the knot. Kailyn and Javi try to make amends. Leah prepares for a new chapter in her life. Kaiser starts preschool while Nathan shares shocking news

episodes.name: Behind the Scenes
episodes.overview: In an expanded two-hour episode, the girls and their families travel to Los Angeles for a 'Teen Mom 2' reunion and the drama follows.  Jenelle and Barbara's onstage feud leads to a backstage blowout and after reconciling with Javi, Kailyn is blindsided by allegations.

episodes.name: And Then There Were Five
episodes.overview: As the eighth season opens, Teen Mom 2’s newest mom, Briana, reunites with an old friend but grapples with an unplanned pregnancy. A sudden move tests Jenelle and David's relationship. Kailyn and Javi finalize their divorce while Leah begins an exciting new chapter.

episodes.name: Down That Route
episodes.overview: Briana is faced with a heart-wrenching decision. Kailyn’s friend reveals some very personal information. Jenelle and Nathan confront each other in court. Leah tries to reunite Addie with Jeremy. Chelsea brings home new baby, Watson.

episodes.name: Low Key
episodes.overview: Kailyn discusses her big news; Briana begins to explore adoption; Aubree has a difficult time adjusting to her brother; Addie's birthday party does not go as planned; Jenelle reconciles with Barb.

episodes.name: Surprise!
episodes.overview: Leah receives some unexpected news from Jeremy; Javi gets information on Kailyn's pregnancy; David plans another big surprise for Jenelle following their daughter's birth; Aubree's school has a father/daughter dance.

episodes.name: Lips Don't Lie
episodes.overview: Leah investigates a business opportunity but Ali struggles with her illness. Kailyn faces Javi in court over the PFA. Chelsea hears disturbing news about Adam. Jace meets his baby sister, Ensley, and Jenelle announces her engagement.

episodes.name: Unfinished Sentences
episodes.overview: Leah faces a difficult decision about college; Jenelle and David hit the rocks while setting up their new home; Briana pursues adoption further; Chelsea worries about Aubree at Adam’s parents; and Kailyn struggles to get back on track.

episodes.name: Motherducker
episodes.overview: Kailyn is furious when her pregnancy is leaked. Briana's mom confronts Luis about the new baby. Aubree gets overexcited about Chelsea's new pets. Ali makes a heartbreaking confession to Leah. Jace spends his first weekend at Jenelle's new house.

episodes.name: On the Hunt
episodes.overview: After Barb refuses to let Jace come over, Jenelle tracks her down. Briana gives Luis an ultimatum. Kailyn and Javi are forced to face each other at Lincoln’s soccer practice. Chelsea and Cole catch baby fever. Leah tries to find answers for Ali.

episodes.name: Playing Family Picnic
episodes.overview: Jenelle has a tumultuous Mother's Day when she's barred from seeing Jace. Briana is under pressure while preparing for her baby shower. Kailyn is shocked when Javi files for child support. Leah and Ali visit the doctor. Aubree finishes first grade.

episodes.name: Welcome to a Puerto Rican Baby Shower
episodes.overview: Briana’s baby shower goes downhill when Luis shows up. Jenelle finally gets her day in court to get Jace back. Kailyn struggles with juggling school, the boys and Javi and Jo. Chelsea takes Aubree out for a girls day. Leah tries to get Ali an aide.

episodes.name: Swiping and Griping
episodes.overview: Jenelle and Barb come to an agreement; Briana receives surprising news from Luis; Leah enters the dating world; Aubree visits Adam; Jo pursues custody of Isaac.

episodes.name: Somewhere Else
episodes.overview: Leah pushes Jeremy to spend more time with Addie. After seeing what Maci is going through, Chelsea reconsiders her visitation agreement with Adam’s parents. Jenelle tries to make her first official weekend with Jace extra special.

episodes.name: Winter in Summer
episodes.overview: Luis asks Briana a shocking question before she goes into labor. Barb attempts to make peace with Jenelle during Kaiser’s birthday party. Kailyn prepares for her graduation. Chelsea takes her family on a trip to Florida.

episodes.name: Oh, the Places You'll Go
episodes.overview: Kailyn graduates from college; a fight between Briana's family and Luis ruins Stella's homecoming; Leah takes another shot at motivational speaking; Jenelle shops for wedding dresses.

episodes.name: Love You, Mean It
episodes.overview: Briana rushes Stella to the hospital; Kailyn's vacation is threatened by court; Leah and Corey believe Gracie may need special attention; Chelsea tries to change Aubree's custody agreement.

episodes.name: Emotional Roller Coaster
episodes.overview: Kailyn's vacation to St. Thomas takes a dramatic turn. Briana learns shocking news about Stella. Jace's 8th birthday leads to more tension between Jenelle and Barb. Leah juggles giving enough attention to both the twins. Aubree starts second grade.

episodes.name: In Sod We Trust
episodes.overview: Jenelle prepares for her wedding day; Kailyn faces the potential of raising her third baby alone; Briana tries to involve Devoin in Nova's life.

episodes.name: The Ties That Bind
episodes.overview: Jenelle walks down the aisle; Chelsea celebrates; Leah tries to get Addie ready for preschool; Kailyn has her baby.

episodes.name: Not to Stir the Pot, But...
episodes.overview: Briana reveals surprising news about Javi to Leah, Jenelle risks losing custody of Kaiser, and Adam is arrested again, forcing Chelsea to rethink visitation.

episodes.name: Drama's for Nerds, Pt. 1
episodes.overview: All the women travel to Los Angeles to film the reunion and specials, and Leah feels caught in the middle as tensions between Kailyn and Briana run high.

episodes.name: Drama's for Nerds, Pt. 2
episodes.overview: Kailyn continues arguing with Briana and Brittany, and Jenelle and David walk away during the reunion taping but later return to face off with Nathan, Doris and Barb.

episodes.name: The Hangover
episodes.overview: Jenelle gets a troubling call from Jace and decides to dial 911 on Barbara. Javi visits Briana in Orlando as their relationship heats up. Leah takes the girls trick-or-treating together. Chelsea is off birth control and ready for another baby

episodes.name: Bitter Baby Mama
episodes.overview: Kailyn and Javi throw separate birthday parties for Lincoln, Chelsea heads to court with her ex, Leah takes Gracie to therapy, and Nathan's text to Jenelle angers David.

episodes.name: Unicorn Poop
episodes.overview: Leah gets a surprising call from Jeremy during the twins’ birthday, Kailyn goes to court with Lux's dad, and Jenelle takes a birthday vacation with all her kids.

episodes.name: Quicksand
episodes.overview: Leah contemplates getting back together with Jeremy, Javi drops a bomb on Briana and Kailyn, and Chelsea struggles to have a good relationship with Adam's mom.

episodes.name: Access Issues
episodes.overview: Briana feels rushed by Javi, the police visit Jenelle and David's house, Chelsea has big news, Kailyn deals with Isaac's custody, and Leah takes care of unexpected guests.

episodes.name: Thirsty
episodes.overview: Briana and Javi make major decisions about their relationship, and Leah grows concerned as Ali's health issues become more obvious at school.

episodes.name: Forgot About Dre
episodes.overview: Javi gets jealous when Briana calls on an ex to take care of her after surgery, Leah and Jeremy reconnect, and Aubree and Cole attend a father-daughter dance.

episodes.name: Trouble in Paradise
episodes.overview: Javi travels to Miami to see Briana, Kailyn and Leah go to Hawaii, Chelsea and Aubree meet up with Taylor and Adam's daughter Paislee, and Nathan and Barbara discuss Jenelle.

episodes.name: Road Rage
episodes.overview: Jenelle confronts an aggressive driver while on the road with Jace, Chelsea and Cole check out the center where Adam will see Aubree, and Leah gets bad news from Ali's school.

episodes.name: On the Mend
episodes.overview: Chelsea finds out that Adam violated his visitation agreement, Barbara tries to take Jenelle to court after her road rage encounter, and Kailyn finalizes custody with Jo.

episodes.name: Dot Dot Dot
episodes.overview: Kailyn comes face to face with Javi's pregnant girlfriend; Chelsea prepares Aubree for her first visit with Adam at the center; Briana tells DeVoin to move out; Leah has a new boyfriend; Jenelle and Nathan square off in court.

episodes.name: Reconnect
episodes.overview: Jenelle is upset when Jace's father unexpectedly reaches out, Chelsea wonders if Adam can get it together for visitations with Aubree, and Isaac visits Javi's house.

episodes.name: Hurricane
episodes.overview: Chelsea may go into early labor; Jenelle faces Hurricane Florence and makes an emergency call about her husband; Kailyn's birthday party for Lux pushes her to reconnect with estranged family; Devoin and Nova get closer.

episodes.name: Don't Wanna Go Home
episodes.overview: Jenelle addresses rumors spurred by the 911 call; Kailyn's sister shares major news when they reconnect in Dallas; Briana visits a new beau in New York; Leah takes Ali to another important doctor's appointment in Columbus.

episodes.name: Shutting Down
episodes.overview: Chelsea finally meets her new baby girl; Jenelle avoids filming, causing concern; Kailyn tries to maintain a long-distance relationship with her sister; Briana's new flame visits Florida for some camping.

episodes.name: Cry it Out
episodes.overview: Stella needs emergency surgery; Leah approaches her breaking point with Jeremy over Addie; Chelsea and Cole bring Layne home; Jenelle struggles with David's absence on the show; Kailyn starts planning her sister's baby shower.

episodes.name: Surprise!
episodes.overview: Chelsea receives surprising news about Adam's other daughter; Briana takes initiative and files for child support from Luis; Jo drops a child support bomb on Kailyn; Jenelle and Nathan's court hearing is postponed.

episodes.name: Cold War
episodes.overview: Jenelle needs emergency surgery; Briana confronts Luis in New York; Kail and Jo come face-to-face for the first time since he filed for child support; Leah tells Jeremy he needs to spend more time with Addie.

episodes.name: Momster Mash
episodes.overview: Barb plans her trip to meet with Jace's dad, causing Jenelle anxiety; impressed with DeVoin's improvement, Briana considers making a big change; Chelsea plans one-on-one time with Aubree; Kailyn is upset when Javi calls her out.

episodes.name: This Can Go One or Two Ways
episodes.overview: Barbara flies to New York to meet with Jace's dad; Adam's parents break the rules of their custody agreement with Chelsea; Lux's dad surprises Kailyn at Lincoln's birthday party after a big fight; Briana takes a family trip.

episodes.name: Peace Gathering
episodes.overview: Lincoln gets a new brother; Kail offers Jenelle a peace offering, but her good deed backfires; Chelsea is forced to confront Adam's parents about continuing their visits with Aubree; Leah receives an update on Ali's vision.

episodes.name: Do the Dangle
episodes.overview: Kail launches her haircare line with a big party in NYC, and a few surprise guests show up. Things don’t go well for Luis when Briana lets him see Stella. Chelsea struggles with the stress of managing three kids.

episodes.name: Home Is Home
episodes.overview: Kail gets a surprising call from Jo’s wife about their child support battle. Nathan and Jenelle go back to court, with a surprising turn. Chelsea throws Aubree a belated birthday celebration.

episodes.name: Something We Said
episodes.overview: Barb and Jenelle have a wild weekend in Atlanta, but things go too far when she brings up another cast member. Kail and Jo celebrate Isaac's birthday together. Briana visits John for his. Leah considers new birth control

episodes.name: Bow Down
episodes.overview: Leah's girls reveal their true feelings about Jason. Chelsea takes a family vacation, but comes home to a shocking find. Jenelle tries to defend her family on social media, but things blow up when another cast member gets involved.

episodes.name: He Didn't Look Like a Prince
episodes.overview: Leah breaks up with Jason. Jenelle's plans to take Jace on a mother-son trip go awry. Briana leaves Luis alone with Stella for the first time. Kailyn gets child support advice from TMOG's Amber. Chelsea tends to a sick Watson.

episodes.name: Checks and Balances
episodes.overview: Chelsea suffers a panic attack; Jenelle visits Briana in Orlando but struggles to film without her husband; Addie is confused about Leah and Jeremy's relationship; Kail finalizes child support with Jo and moves on.

episodes.name: Family Portrait
episodes.overview: Leah and Jeremy rush Addie to the ER; Jenelle questions her future with the show; Briana lets DeVoin take a major step forward with Nova; Chelsea debates how to treat her anxiety.

episodes.name: Hey, Girl, Hey
episodes.overview: Jade joins the cast but trust issues threaten an important anniversary with Sean; Briana allows Devoin to take Nova for the weekend; Leah and Jeremy get flirty in New York.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Jungle
episodes.overview: Briana confronts Devoin in New York; Jade tries to smooth things over with Sean before moving into their new house; Leah and Kailyn vacation together in Costa Rica; Chelsea and Cole consider a new opportunity.

episodes.name: Direct Message
episodes.overview: Leah faces another health scare with Addie; Jade and Sean reach a boiling point, forcing her to move out; Briana is torn when she gets a suspicious message about John; Adam surprises Aubree; Lux's father puts Kailyn in a difficult situation.

episodes.name: Truth Hurts
episodes.overview: Sean refuses to let Jade get her things from their house, so she goes to the police. Leah gets some shocking news about her sister. Javi and Lauren are rocked by an on-camera revelation from Kailyn. Briana and John visit the Dominican Republic.

episodes.name: Walking the Walk
episodes.overview: When Nova misses her dad, Briana puts her anger with DeVoin aside. Jade tries to distance herself from Sean but worries how it will affect Kloie. Leah’s kids become suspicious of her possible romance with Jeremy. Kailyn reconsiders a move.

episodes.name: Make It or Break It
episodes.overview: Sean pleads with Jade to let him see Kloie; Jo throws a wrench into Kailyn's vacation plans; Leah considers what the Hawaii trip could mean for her and Jeremy; Briana wants to take her relationship with John to the next level.

episodes.name: Getting Lei'd
episodes.overview: Gracie reveals some deep feelings about Jeremy to Leah while on vacation in Hawaii. Briana celebrates Stella's second birthday, but leaves someone off the guest list. Jade worries her mom is slipping back into old habits.

episodes.name: Normal Parents
episodes.overview: Jade's relationship with her mom deteriorates. Things for Briana and John crumble when she visits him in NY. Ali gains independence at a camp for children with muscular dystrophy. Kail celebrates Lux's birthday.

episodes.name: Bailout
episodes.overview: When Jade’s parents are arrested, she’s forced to pick up the pieces. Devoin tries to prove to Briana that he can be around for Nova. Leah welcomes Ali home from camp. Chelsea celebrates her shared birthday with Layne. Kailyn makes a big investment.

episodes.name: Sugar-Coated Mood
episodes.overview: Briana makes a major decision, leaving John sidelined. With her parents still in jail, Jade reaches to Sean for support. Chelsea’s anxiety rises with the launch of her clothing design. Kailyn has a big surprise for the boys. Leah's girls start school.

episodes.name: Don't Miss the Sunset
episodes.overview: Chelsea celebrates Aubrey's 10th birthday; Leah and Jeremy plan a night alone but things don't go as expected; Kailyn gets heartbreaking news about a family member; Luis asks to borrow money from Briana.

episodes.name: Bear
episodes.overview: Kailyn and her boys say goodbye to the family dog. Jade takes Sean in with surprising results. Briana confronts John about their deteriorating relationship. Chelsea gets a shocking request from Adam's mom. Leah is reminded of her past with Jeremy.

episodes.name: New Season, Old Wounds
episodes.overview: Briana, frustrated by Luis' absence, tracks him down at a nightclub. After a major fight with her mom, things get even worse for Jade at Kloie's birthday party. Jeremy starts drama with Corey, putting Leah in the middle.

episodes.name: About Last Night
episodes.overview: Briana returns after a night with Luis. Isaac makes a confession to Kailyn, prompting her to reconsider her custody agreement with Jo. Jade is forced to juggle single-parenthood while preparing for her beauty license exam.

episodes.name: Blood and Water
episodes.overview: Jade's mom asks her for a big favor. Briana takes an STI test after her night with Luis. Chelsea takes Aubree out for a mother-daughter day. Leah and Victoria visit her boyfriend in Costa Rica. Kailyn gets a surprising phone call.

episodes.name: Hello from the Other Side
episodes.overview: Kailyn hears from her estranged mom. Briana gets the results of her STI test. Jade graduates beauty school but family complications threaten her big day. Chelsea guides Aubree as she considers inviting Adam to the Father/Daughter dance.

episodes.name: Taking Charge
episodes.overview: Briana confronts Luis about her STI test results. Jade is forced to support her family after they all lose their jobs. Kailyn and Jo go to counseling. Aubree reconsiders the Father/Daughter dance. Jeremy helps Leah.

episodes.name: Where Have You Been?
episodes.overview: An explosive family brawl leaves Jade caught between Sean and her parents. DeVoin's family reappears in Briana and Nova's lives after being absent for years. Kailyn tries to connect with her sister.

episodes.name: Dilemmas and Debacles
episodes.overview: Jade is caught between her mom and Sean, but a drug test could reveal the truth. Meanwhile, after Ali has a bad fall, Leah is forced to balance her growing concerns and supporting her sister during childbirth.

episodes.name: Impossible Choice
episodes.overview: Leah worries about Ali, Kailyn goes house hunting, Jade tells her parents to move out, Chelsea considers changing Aubree's custody agreement, and Briana's Thanksgiving dinner turns awkward.

episodes.name: Piece of Me
episodes.overview: Kail celebrates Isaac's birthday while life-changing news weighs on her. Leah reveals secrets about her past. Briana gives Devoin an opportunity to step up. Chelsea tries to change Aubree's visitation agreement with Adam’s parents.

episodes.name: Do Something
episodes.overview: The new coronavirus threatens Leah’s travel plans and brings up serious concerns for Ali’s health. Briana holds a summit with Devoin and Luis to insist they take on financial responsibility. Kailyn opens up about her pregnancy.

episodes.name: Until the World Ends
episodes.overview: The threat of coronavirus intensifies as Chelsea travels to Los Angeles for work. Leah and the girls go into self-quarantine to protect Ali. Briana has a new, secret fling with the potential for major heartbreak.

episodes.name: Remote Control
episodes.overview: When coronavirus makes it unsafe for crews to film, the moms pick up the cameras to self-shoot. Despite quarantine, Leah’s book release pushes her and Jeremy to confront their past. Jade is forced to close her salon during lockdown, placing her under major financial and emotional strain. Chelsea fears she has COVID. Briana is furloughed but Devoin also loses his job, putting her in a precarious financial position.

episodes.name: Not-So-Normal Times
episodes.overview: As the country emerges from quarantine, Briana struggles with the decision to send Nova back to school. Chelsea and Cole try for another baby. Kail and Jo struggle with the decision to let Isaac have more say, and Leah's family has a covid-19 scare.

episodes.name: Bizarre New World
episodes.overview: Kail gives birth to her fourth child. Chelsea worries about her health amid Cole’s COVID-19 scare. Briana and Devoin get into a fight about finances. Leah’s world is flipped upside down with all three kids at home. Jade calls Sean out.

episodes.name: Tongue-Tied
episodes.overview: Leah juggles virtual learning, Chelsea and Cole debate sending Watson to school, Briana celebrates Nova's birthday, Kailyn receives mixed messages, and tempers flare between Jade and Sean.

episodes.name: Say OK
episodes.overview: Jade’s frustrations force her to break up with Sean. Kailyn tries to co-parent through the stress of virtual learning. Chelsea gets busier as COVID-19 numbers spike in South Dakota

episodes.name: Just Don't Sink It
episodes.overview: Briana addresses Devoin's punctuality, Chelsea faces new covid-19 restrictions, Kailyn's past remarks cause a stir, Leah spots tension between the twins, and Jade reaches her breaking point.

episodes.name: Under the Big Top
episodes.overview: Chelsea makes a difficult decision about her future. Leah withdraws Gracie from cheer in order to keep Ali safe. Kailyn tries to make amends. Jade deals with Sean’s literal and figurative messes after he breaks her window. Briana cuts Devoin.

episodes.name: Spring Has Sprung
episodes.overview: Leah has a health scare, Briana agrees to let Devoin see Nova, Jade asks Sean to be a more consistent co-parent, Kail makes a fresh start, and Ashley gets an anniversary surprise from bar.

episodes.name: Just Say Yes
episodes.overview: Ashley contemplates her wedding, Kail receives frustrating news from her kids' school, Leah focuses on her health, Jade deals with a stressful moving day, and Luis contacts Briana.

episodes.name: Level Up
episodes.overview: Ashley celebrates Bar's ged, Briana focuses on Nova after a disappointment, Kail sets boundaries with Isaac, Jade takes her time with Sean, and Leah navigates covid-19 in her community.

episodes.name: Not Quite
episodes.overview: Sean proposes, but Jade’s not sure how to respond. Leah is forced into quarantine when Jeremy tests positive for covid. Ashley plans a surprise party for Bar. Briana introduces her man to the cameras. Kail helps Isaac find an interest that he likes.

episodes.name: Full Circle
episodes.overview: Kail invites Devoin on her podcast. Jade decides to get plastic surgery in Miami, so Briana visits to coach her through her anxiety. Bar goes to court for his outstanding DUI charges. Leah's twins turn 11.

episodes.name: M.I.A.
episodes.overview: Jade gets plastic surgery but her recovery turns dangerous, and Briana tries to help her as the situation escalates. Ashley juggles even more when she finds out she has to suddenly move. Leah gets news that will help Ali be more independent.

episodes.name: Mutual Combat
episodes.overview: Jade’s recovery gets even rockier when tensions rise between Sean and her parents. Ashley and Bar make a tough wedding decision as he faces another court date. Leah plans a birthday party for Addie, hoping Jeremy can make it.

episodes.name: Bonded For Life
episodes.overview: Jade plans to fly home, but Briana tries to convince her to come back to Orlando with her instead. Kail reveals heartbreaking challenges around a recent medical diagnosis. When Addie struggles with online learning, Leah makes a tough decision.

episodes.name: Cut Out
episodes.overview: Jade recovers at Briana’s house, but has to make a hard decision about her family. Leah tries to balance Ali and Aleeah’s unique needs. Kail juggles three different coparenting relationships. Bar starts college while Ashley plans a birthday surprise.

episodes.name: On The Shoulders Of Giants
episodes.overview: Ashley and Bar grapple racist backlash. Kloie’s behavior wedges a divide between Jade and Sean. Briana travels for surgery, but returns to something shocking. Leah meets her doctor in hopes of getting answers about the lump on her breast.

episodes.name: Backslide
episodes.overview: Jade's career is moving forward, but her relationship with Sean begins to slip. While Ashley prepares to receive her Associate’s Degree, Bar’s schoolwork hits a road black. As Leah’s second ultrasound approaches, she braces for the results.

episodes.name: Off The Leash
episodes.overview: Kail faces a court battle with Chris. Bar’s DUI resurfaces & threatens to ruin Ashley’s graduation party. Leah finds out if she needs surgery on her tumor. After meeting with a lawyer about Luis’ parental rights, Briana is left with some hard choices

episodes.name: Season 10-B Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: Leah and Kail reflect on their growth over the last 10 years while Jade and Briana discuss their traumatic experience in Miami. Dr. Drew and Nessa welcome Ashley to her first TM2 reunion and Devoin joins Kail to discuss fallout from their podcast.

episodes.name: Bless This Mess
episodes.overview: Kail files a lawsuit against Briana while Leah meets a new love interest. Sean hits a crossroads in his sobriety as Jade struggles in their relationship. After a low key wedding, Ashley and Bar hit the rocks and she considers ending things for good.

episodes.name: Chris-Cross
episodes.overview: Briana goes on Kail’s ex’s podcast leading to explosive consequences. Kloie has a medical emergency & Jade must navigate solo with Sean gone, Ashley contemplates the divorce while Bar visits his mom in Ohio. Leah goes on a date but gets a shocking call.

episodes.name: Garlic Breath
episodes.overview: After Kloie's dental surgery, Christy drops a bomb on Jade. Briana goes on a family vacation but tensions between her and Javi boil over. Ashley navigates living with her ex after Bar returns from Ohio. Leah gets to know Jaylan.

episodes.name: Picture Perfect
episodes.overview: Ashley hits her boiling point. Jade kicks Christy out before she goes to jail. Bri questions if both dads will be present for the first day of school. Leah gets an exciting invitation that could be a big step for her new relationship.

episodes.name: Officially Official
episodes.overview: Kail uncovers a secret Vee & Javi have been keeping. Leah introduces Jaylan to the girls. Jade tries to create stability for Kloie, who is struggling in Sean’s absence. Briana & Devoin use lessons from therapy to rebuild their co-parenting relationship.

episodes.name: There’s No Crying in Football
episodes.overview: Jade & Kloie reunite with Sean after 3 months apart. Stella has a medical emergency that Briana is forced to navigate without Luis. Bar’s past threatens reconnection. Jaylan has a chance to move closer to Leah, but it’s not what either of them hoped for.

episodes.name: Natural Mother
episodes.overview: Jade & Sean reignite their spark. Briana reaches out to Luis’ parents in frustration. Kail and Javi swing the co-parenting pendulum between frustration and flirtation. Ashley & Bar must uproot themselves again and consider taking steps to get vaccinated.

episodes.name: Under My Roof
episodes.overview: Kail reveals news about Chris while Briana becomes overwhelmed by Stella’s father’s absence. Jaylan & Leah make a major move forward. Ashley’s vaccination decision upsets her mom. Jade gets a new house but is unsure who will live there when Sean returns.

episodes.name: Falling on the Grenade
episodes.overview: Kail and Javi consider reuniting. Ashley supports Bar through his mom’s health concerns. Briana tries to bring Luis and Devoin together for her girls. Jaylan grows closer to Leah and her family. Jade opens a new salon while prepping for Sean’s return.

episodes.name: Run Miles, Not Your Mouth
episodes.overview: Kail makes a public allegation about Briana, so Bri sends her a gift. Jade & Kloie welcome Sean home from rehab. Leah realizes she & Jaylan don’t see marriage the same way. Ashley & Bar reignite their romance while Kail considers her future on the show.

episodes.name: Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: Leah speaks out about the social media drama that has gone down recently and Kail reveals she’s in a new relationship. Jade discusses rekindling her love for Sean post-rehab and Ashley explains how she avoided divorce.

episodes.name: Reunion (2)
episodes.overview: Kail shares a devastating secret while Briana defends her choices. Kail’s ex, Chris, shares his side of the story and a surprise guest shocks everyone.
